title: Heads and Tales : or, Anecdotes and Stories of Quadrupeds and Other Beasts, Chiefly Connected with Incidents in the Histories of More or Less Distinguished Men.
author: Various
snippet: But to the Culter "Luath," to hear was to obey; and in aquarter of an hour a flock of sheep, which had been feeding on ahillSide half a mile off, were brought back, driven by this faithful"bit doggie."
